Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional piece, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000. We understand that value perception varies from person to person, so if this price aligns with your expectations, please let us know. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
